questions.question: What type of flooring is provided?
questions.answer: We provide vitrified tiles in all rooms.

questions.question: Can I choose wooden flooring?
questions.answer: Wooden flooring is optional in bedrooms at extra cost.

questions.question: Is bathroom flooring anti-skid?
questions.answer: Yes, all bathrooms have anti-skid tiles.

questions.question: What is the warranty on flooring?
questions.answer: Flooring comes with a 10-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

questions.question: Can I change the tiles post-possession?
questions.answer: Yes, with prior permission and at your own cost.

questions.question: Are the kitchen floors different?
questions.answer: Kitchen floors use stain-resistant ceramic tiles.

questions.question: Is carpet flooring available?
questions.answer: No, we do not offer carpet flooring currently.

questions.question: Are floor leveling issues covered?
questions.answer: Yes, theyâ€™re addressed during inspection and handover.

questions.question: Can I choose my meals?
questions.answer: Yes, you can select from the available weekly menu.

questions.question: When will I receive my order?
questions.answer: Between 11 AM and 1 PM daily.

questions.question: Can I skip a delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, inform us at least 24 hours before.

questions.question: Are meals freshly prepared?
questions.answer: Yes, all meals are prepared fresh every morning.

questions.question: Are there vegetarian options?
questions.answer: We offer both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.

questions.question: Can I customize my meal portions?
questions.answer: Yes, portion size options are available.

questions.question: Is the packaging eco-friendly?
questions.answer: Yes, we use biodegradable containers.

questions.question: How do I report a missing item?
questions.answer: Contact customer care through the app or helpline.

questions.question: Do you offer monthly meal subscriptions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer discounted meal plans for subscribers.

questions.question: Which units offer river views?
questions.answer: Units on the eastern face offer river views.

questions.question: Can I select a lake view?
questions.answer: Yes, lake-facing units are limited but available.

questions.question: Is there a park view option?
questions.answer: Yes, selected blocks face the central park.

questions.question: Do all balconies have views?
questions.answer: Most balconies are strategically placed for optimal views.

questions.question: Are corner flats better for views?
questions.answer: Corner units offer dual views and better light.

questions.question: Do top floors have better views?
questions.answer: Yes, top floors offer panoramic views.

questions.question: Can I visit the site to check views?
questions.answer: Yes, book a visit and our team will assist you.

questions.question: What brand switches are used?
questions.answer: We use Legrand or equivalent branded switches.

questions.question: Is inverter wiring included?
questions.answer: Yes, provisions are made for inverters.

questions.question: Are USB ports available?
questions.answer: USB-charging ports are available in select points.

questions.question: Are all points earthed properly?
questions.answer: Yes, safety is ensured via professional installations.

questions.question: Can I add extra switchboards?
questions.answer: Yes, during customization phase only.

questions.question: What if a socket doesn't work?
questions.answer: Our team will resolve such issues during warranty period.

questions.question: Are geyser points provided?
questions.answer: Yes, every bathroom has geyser-ready points.

questions.question: Do the fans come pre-installed?
questions.answer: Fans are not included in the base package.

questions.question: Who handles post-handover maintenance?
questions.answer: A professional agency manages all common areas.

questions.question: Is there a separate maintenance charge?
questions.answer: Yes, it is calculated per square foot monthly.

questions.question: Can I opt out of services?
questions.answer: Essential services are mandatory, others are optional.

questions.question: Are plumbers/electricians available?
questions.answer: Yes, request services via the app or helpdesk.

questions.question: How do I raise a complaint?
questions.answer: Use the resident portal or mobile app.

questions.question: What about waste disposal?
questions.answer: Waste is collected daily from the doorstep.

questions.question: Is pest control included?
questions.answer: Quarterly pest control for common areas is included.

questions.question: Are there emergency services?
questions.answer: Yes, 24x7 emergency maintenance is available.

questions.question: Can I contact the manager directly?
questions.answer: Yes, their contact details are available on the app.

questions.question: How many lifts per tower?
questions.answer: Each tower has 2 passenger lifts and 1 service lift.

questions.question: Is lift backup available?
questions.answer: Yes, lifts have 24x7 generator backup.

questions.question: Are the lifts brand new?
questions.answer: Yes, we use lifts from reputed global brands.

questions.question: Are lifts maintained regularly?
questions.answer: Yes, preventive maintenance is scheduled monthly.

questions.question: Can pets use the lift?
questions.answer: Yes, but only the service lift.

questions.question: What if the lift breaks down?
questions.answer: Emergency service is dispatched immediately.

questions.question: Are lifts accessible to wheelchair users?
questions.answer: Yes, all lifts are designed for accessibility.

questions.question: Do lifts have CCTV?
questions.answer: Yes, all lifts have security surveillance.

questions.question: Are different tiles used in balconies?
questions.answer: Yes, matte-finish tiles are used for safety.

questions.question: Are tiles stain resistant?
questions.answer: Yes, especially in kitchens and bathrooms.

questions.question: Can I replace tiles post-handover?
questions.answer: Yes, after formal approval from the builder.

questions.question: Is underfloor heating available?
questions.answer: Currently not available.

questions.question: Are tiles sourced locally?
questions.answer: We use a mix of local and imported tiles.

questions.question: Are there options for marble?
questions.answer: Premium packages include Italian marble options.

questions.question: Can I view samples before finalization?
questions.answer: Yes, available at the experience center.

questions.question: Is the countertop granite?
questions.answer: Yes, kitchens have black granite countertops.

questions.question: Are storage units modular?
questions.answer: Yes, modular cabinets are part of the kitchen setup.

questions.question: Is chimney provided?
questions.answer: Yes, chimney and hob are included in the package.

questions.question: What if I want a bigger sink?
questions.answer: Sink size can be customized during construction.

questions.question: Are water purifier points available?
questions.answer: Yes, RO points are pre-installed.

questions.question: Can I move the stove position?
questions.answer: No, the layout is fixed as per safety standards.

questions.question: Do you offer dual-basin sinks?
questions.answer: Yes, in premium kitchen packages.

questions.question: Are exhaust fans installed?
questions.answer: Yes, exhaust is standard in all kitchens.

questions.question: Can I upgrade to a higher floor?
questions.answer: Yes, subject to availability at extra cost.

questions.question: What views do ground floors have?
questions.answer: Typically garden or entrance views.

questions.question: Is the view blocked by other buildings?
questions.answer: All towers are spaced to ensure open views.

questions.question: Are construction views temporary?
questions.answer: Yes, they will clear once development completes.

questions.question: Do balconies have glass railings?
questions.answer: Yes, for unobstructed views.

questions.question: Are views part of the pricing?
questions.answer: Yes, view-based pricing tiers apply.

questions.question: Do higher floors have better resale?
questions.answer: Typically yes, due to premium views.
